venue.name: Charles River Canoe and Kayak, Newton Boathouse

item.description:
What a great way to view the leaves up close and personal. It'll be great, just dress accordingly - sweatshirt or wind breaker should do the trick!

We'll paddle about 2-3 hours, it's a nice flat water easy, easy paddle. Cost should be about $35's or less depending on how many join us.

See you on the water ;-)

Susan

**Weather permitting - will email all the night before if we have to cancel

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: Leaf Peeping Kayaking on the Charles
